title: Mic not working in speech to text (Gboard) or Google asst. Pixel 4XL. Mic works elsewhere.
content: I just received my pixel 4xl today and everything works, except the microphone when using speech to text through gboard or attempting to train or use the google assistant. I have latest updates, I've tried many guides online. No success.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
